promptForName: Generate a unique, original, creative, short, single-word name for a gigantic rare lynx steel-type pokemon wearing a metallic crystal headband. It can be found in mountain-like environments. Do not use the words pokemon, steel or lynx. Ony answer with the generated name
promptForDescription: Generate a short, original, creative Pokedex description for Crystiferous, a a gigantic rare lynx steel-type pokemon. It can be found in mountain-like environments It has the following abilities: Geo Impact. Be creative about its day-to-day life. Do not use the words "lynx", "steel" or "Crystiferous". Use a maximum of 150 characters. Only answer with the generated description.
promptForVisual: mdjrny-v4 style portrait of steel-type pokemon, lynx-like, rare, digital art, sugimori, chibi, centered, full body, grey ambient lighting
generatedDescription: This colossal feline, shimmering with mineral armor, prowls mountainous landscapes. With Geo Impact, it can cause crystal showers.
